# Hashtag Testing

Hashtags in Mattermosts should render as specified below. 

#### These strings should auto-link:

#testing
#testing123
#test-test
#test_test
#test! (punctuation should be excluded from linking)
#test1 #test2
#hÃ¼llo

#### These strings should not auto-link:

#123test
#?test
#-test
